Uses of Class
opendial.inference.Query.ReduceQuery

  • Packages that use Query.ReduceQuery 
    Package Description
    opendial.inference  
    opendial.inference.approximate  
    opendial.inference.exact  

    • Uses of Query.ReduceQuery in opendial.inference

      Methods in opendial.inference with parameters of type Query.ReduceQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BNetwork InferenceAlgorithm.reduce(Query.ReduceQuery query)
      Generates a new Bayesian network that only contains a subset of variables in the original network and integrates the provided evidence.
      BNetwork SwitchingAlgorithm.reduce(Query.ReduceQuery query)
      Reduces a Bayesian network to a subset of variables.

    • Uses of Query.ReduceQuery in opendial.inference.approximate

      Methods in opendial.inference.approximate with parameters of type Query.ReduceQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BNetwork SamplingAlgorithm.reduce(Query.ReduceQuery query)
      Reduces the Bayesian network to a subset of its variables and returns the result.

    • Uses of Query.ReduceQuery in opendial.inference.exact

      Methods in opendial.inference.exact with parameters of type Query.ReduceQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BNetwork NaiveInference.reduce(Query.ReduceQuery query)
      Reduces the Bayesian network to a subset of its variables.
      BNetwork VariableElimination.reduce(Query.ReduceQuery query)
      Reduces the Bayesian network by retaining only a subset of variables and marginalising out the rest.
